title: Ming Ming World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Historical   Martial Arts
tags: Male Protagonist   Politics   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Transmigration
author: 月麒麟
description:
A brief introduction to the world under Ming dynasty: “Ming” is seeking world historical fiction novels published by the author of the novels of Ming Kylin

In Wanli’s twenty-first year, Zhu Changluo and his mother left the palace, no one cared about the prince in dire straits!

Up to Liaodong, down to Jiangnan, then to Mongolia, stopping to fight with other factions.

In the middle of the last golden age of the Ming Dynasty, Zhu Changluo came, vowing to let the Chinese Foundation continue forever!

Everything under the heavens should be mine! Anyone who tries to take it away is doing it in vain!>
